intro: The v-parallax component creates a 3d effect that makes an image appear to scroll slower than the window.

content.heading: Content
content.intro: You can also place any content inside of the parallax. This allows you to use the parallax as a hero image.

height.heading: Custom height
height.intro: You can specify a custom height on a parallax. Keep in mind this can break the parallax if your image is not sized properly
